        public static boolean isTrapeze(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D> points)
        Verifies if a quadrilateral shape is trapezois i.e there are two segment that are parallel Uses the fact that the sum of two consecutive angles is equal to 180 degrees hence their sin are equal

        Returns:
        true if the shape is trapezois
